body.name: TheraNeem Neem Mouthwash, Herbal Mint | Freshens Breath, Supports Healthy Gums and Teeth, Vegan, Great Mint Taste | 16oz
features: Ayurvedic Tradition: Neem has been used for thousands of years for its beneficial effect on the body
A Healthy Mouth: Supercritical extracts of neem and other herbs help support healthy gums and teeth
Fresh and Pure: Cooling herbal mint formula cleans and freshens breath while soothing gums
Our Promise: 100% vegan; lab verified for the purity and quality of its ingredients
body.description: The TheraNeem Standard Since 1998, Theraneem has offered gentle herbal products based on Ayurvedic traditions that date back thousands of years. Our formulas combine a deep knowledge of neem, tea tree and other restorative herbs with the latest in modern technologies. Because quality is one of our highest priorities, we use only the finest ingredients and ensure every TheraNeem product meets or exceeds our high standards of purity and potency – that’s our promise to you!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #48,187 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #251 in Mouthwashes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oral Tradition Used in Ayurvedic herbal traditions for thousands of years, neem is an excellent cleanser and soothing agent for sensitive teeth and gums. A Healthy Smile Along with daily brushing, flossing and regular visits to your dentist, our Neem Mouthwash is an important step towards healthy gums and teeth. Minty Fresh Suitable for diabetics and great for kids, our cooling mint formula cleans your mouth and freshens breath with organic neem, clove and star anise. TheraNeem Pure Our gentle herbal mouthwash is 100% vegan and made with ingredients that meet the TheraNeem high standard of purity and quality.

Native to India and other parts of Asia, the neem tree has been revered in Ayurvedic herbal traditions for thousands of years for its beneficial effect on the body. The nutrient-rich extracts from neem’s leaves and bark are excellent additions to oral care products for their cleansing and freshening properties and their soothing effect on gums and teeth. TheraNeem Neem Mouthwash Herbal Mint Therapé uses concentrated organic neem bark and leaf supercritical extracts to cleanse and cool your mouth. We’ve added even more supercritical extracts – organic clove, star anise, peppermint and spearmint – for lasting freshness and a naturally clean feeling. Swish or gargle twice daily as needed to support healthy gums and teeth and keep your breath fresh. Sweetened with xylitol, Neem Mouthwash is suitable for diabetics, and is 100% vegan. Plus both children and adults will love the natural, herbal mint flavor! Superior Ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Gel*, Sorbitol, Glycerin (Vegetarian) Poloxamer 407, Supercritical Extracts of Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Bud*, Illicium Verum (Star Anise) Oil*, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Leaf* and Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Bark*, Thymus Serphyllum (White Thyme) Leaf Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Xylitol, Potassium Sorbate. *Certified Organic

Today, TheraNeem offers the world’s most comprehensive line of neem-based products for the entire family. Rich antioxidants and essential fatty acids, neem is extraordinarily nourishing to the skin, hair and soft tissues. Most of our products are made with 100% organic neem seed oil, neem leaf tea, and/or supercritical extracts. TheraNeem currently provides more than 50 personal care products made with clean, wholesome ingredients that are beneficial to your health and the health of our planet. The TheraNeem Standard Since 1998, Theraneem has offered gentle herbal products based on Ayurvedic traditions that date back thousands of years. Our formulas combine a deep knowledge of neem, tea tree and other restorative herbs with the latest in modern technologies. Because quality is one of our highest priorities, we use only the finest ingredients and ensure every TheraNeem product meets or exceeds our high standards of purity and potency – that’s our promise to you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My dentist was very happy with this purchase! So and I!
reviews.reviewText: Went to the dentist recently, she was happy it inform me whatever new thing I was trying was working! (I've have some not significant issues with me gums, but enough to keep an eye on for a while) she said I should keep doin, what I've been doing! So this is my first bottle from Amazon, first was from a store near me. But I was happy to find it here, that store was a good distance from here, bought out of high hopes! So...YAY! A win for a natural product!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're not using this, you're probably using poison
reviews.reviewText: Alcohol free, Sulfate free, Paraben free, Gluten free, No Artificial Colors or Flavors, Suitable for diabetics and children, Cruelty Free and vegan. It's also leave the mouth minty fresh and lively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouthwash recently and I must say I really love using it. I look forward to using it each day 😁. Definitely will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: My sister told me I should buy this mouthwash after I told her I had thrush on my tongue. When I tried this for the first time, I actually like the taste, compared to Listerene Scope etc mouthwash that has alcohol in it. I’m pretty sure that’s had some minor role in me getting thrush which is an overgrowth of yeast. I wasn’t keen on the price however my tongue went from WHITE to Roses PINK after using this mouthwash after 3 or 4 weeks. It really freshens your breath. I will be purchasing another bottle of this. I believe I found my lifetime mouthwash. This isn’t a miracle mouthwash, however I believe in using natural products from nature (There is a reason why God made these things, plants, oils, herbs, spice, etc) I believe God-made products are the best compared to most man-made products period! I don’t believe you will be disappointed with this mouthwash except spending the higher dollar amount compared to over the counter products. But even some OTC products are ridiculously over priced. For my budget as a single mom this was a little higher than I would had liked to pay but considering the results, it seems it was an excellent purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023

Tastes peculiar but no worse than other mouthwashes. Soothing to the nth degree. Teeth and gums looking good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 24, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: Ditch the alcohol-based mouthwash and switch to this!
reviews.reviewText: I was sceptical when I first purchased this years ago. It's pricey, it tastes a bit funny and sweet, and I wasn't sure there was enough active ingredient in it to live up to its claims. But I've been swearing by this stuff for years now.A few months after I first started using it, I went in for a dental cleaning and the hygienist wanted to know what I was using--and the dentist asked me the same thing. I was convinced it'd caused damage somehow (you don't want to hear "...seriously, what have you been using on your teeth?" when they're poking around with steel hooks) but instead they were both shocked by how great my gums looked, how much less tartar I had, and how the few shallow gum pockets I'd had were completely healed. I have a family history of gum disease, so hearing this was absolutely amazing news. Both the dentist and hygienist asked me to write down the name of this mouthwash for them so they could recommend it to their patients. Granted, maybe it's just me, or maybe I was doing something different that was an external factor (change in diet, etc) but my dentist was based in a major teaching hospital and in charge of the department. She wasn't prone to acknowledging alternative products, so that all came as a pleasant surprise.The neem in this is the winner and if you've ever smelled neem on its own, you'll be pleased to know you can't smell it in this mouthwash. It's a little bit sweet and you want to swish it around as long as possible (2-3min minimum if you can; the longer, the better) for maximum effect. I usually use Sarakan in the morning (gentler flavour, but not as effective) and this after I've brushed my teeth at night and before I hop in the shower so that I can swish as long as I'm in there. I've tried the cinnamon flavour, as well, but the mint has a nicer aftertaste.We went a few months without it and I could feel my tartar buildup starting again, and my partner started complaining of bleeding gums while flossing. (She's the one who prefers Sarakan.) We added this back in and within a week, we're back to normal.Aside: I should add that a major improvement in gum health and tartar buildup was noticeable when we switched first to a paleo diet, and then transitioned from there to a ketogenic paleo diet (LCHF), as both reduce sugar (which is a prime source of food for tartar-causing bacteria) and encourage fermented foods. We use this mouthwash in conjunction with Dr Tung's floss (fantastic stuff) and Urtekram toothpaste (tea tree is nice, same with green tea and licorice).

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic mouth rinse ! Respect for the centuries Neems been used !
reviews.reviewText: Neem & this brand is cream of the crop ! Great mouth rinse & been used in India for centuries ! Personally love the taste . Bc its all natural might not appeal to all, but get rid of horrible ingredients , including many mouth rinses/washes with alcohol . etc If never tried recommend for people to try. It's also said to prevent gum disease. Personally I have never encountered a person from India with bad teeth ! Making a little light of it ...but think about it, its true ! Might seem pricey to some but it goes a long way. Started 1 daughter off with the same brand toothpaste. VERY HAPPY THAT YOU'VE BEEN LISTENING AMAZON , TAKING MY ISSUES SERIOUSLY...DELIVERY PEOPLE RING MY APARTMENT DOOR & ITEMS ARE BEING PROPERLY BUBBLE WRAPPED ! HUGE SINCERE THANK YOU ! (still some of them just drop package ?? can hear it , no reason for it ...but hey progress is being made ! )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 1, 2013
reviews.reviewText: Using interdental brushes dipped in the mouthwash it has most certainly helped to reduce bleeding from my gums and also the associated sensitivity. In fact, using it regularly, now they don't bleed at all. It tastes fine, with me neither loving it nor hating it.One bottle lasts a fair amount of time, although accidentally I spilled over half of the last bottle when travelling back from my mums. So now I'm now on my 3rd bottle. I envisage using this and will continue to use it for ever.I have nothing negative to say about this product.
Bottle leaking top and bottom. Refund in process so I never tried it.
